answers.answer: This sounds like a nerve problem- pinched or otherwise. Because it also kind of sounds like peripheral neuropathy I really suggest you talk to your dr. Sometimes a serious thing can cause this problem- like diabetes, so it's best to play it safe and double check what's going on.

question: MY FOOT FEELS SO COLD IT ACTUALLY BURNS, WHEN MY HUSBAND TOUCHES MY FEET THEY FEEL NORMAL.WHEN I AD PRESSURE TO MY CALF IT RELEVES THIS SENSATION.
title: pain
